dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3510136D] Illegal content on one of your hosted sites.
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2007 1:47 AM
To: DMCA
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3510136D] Illegal content on one of your
hosted sites.

==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. Illegal content on one of your hosted sites.

MIME element (text/plain) 
Tho whom it may concern: 
 
Domain name: redaxxion.com 
IP Whois Results: 
 
    Connecting to whois.arin.net... 
    OrgName:    ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. 
 
 
I found this site www.redaxxion.com that was posting content of my 
site whit out my permission, I have advised the webmaster and my 
attorney of this situation, but browsing the site, I find out that 
most of their content its illegal, Warez, movies, MP3, porn etc.. all 
pirated material. 
 
The site is in Spanish, and own by a Mexican guy, so he thinks he is 
not affected by US law, although the site is in the US... 
I think they are in violation of your AUP, in many ways. 
 
Link to forum its kind of hard to navigate so I'll put some examples... 
 
Movies, Games, Music etc... 
300 the movie 
http://www.redaxxion.com/foro/showthread.php?t=15058 
Happy Feet 
http://www.redaxxion.com/foro/showthread.php?t=8859 
Phil Collins 
http://www.redaxxion.com/foro/showthread.php?t=15011 
 
Underage girl pictures !! 
http://www.redaxxion.com/foro/showthread.php?p=402103#post402102 
You will find lots more if you look a bit... 
 
Warez  (you need to be registered) 
http://www.redaxxion.com/foro/forumdisplay.php?f=11 
 
 
 
It will take you a minute without speaking Spanish's to figure out how 
to browse and find all the posts with all kinds of prohibited 
material, Warez, Serials, Pirated MP3 And Albums, and on top of that 
they post images like upskirts of underage persons and obviously 
without their consent.
